entry.title: Machine Learning using PySpark
entry.content:
Background

PySpark is an interface for Apache Spark in Python. It not only allows you to write Spark applications using Python APIs, but also provides the PySpark shell for interactively analyzing your data in a distributed environment.1

Goals

To learn about the implementation of PySpark for machine learning.

Results

Visit here to view the notebooks.
entry.summary: Background PySpark is an interface for Apache Spark in Python. It not only allows you to write Spark applications using Python APIs, but also provides the PySpark shell for interactively analyzing your data in a distributed environment.1 Goals To learn about the implementation of PySpark for machine learning. Results Visit here to view the notebooks.

entry.title: Goodreads Scrapper using BeautifulSoup on Python

link.title: Goodreads Scrapper using BeautifulSoup on Python

entry.content:
Background

Goodreads is the world’s largest site for readers and book recommendations. Their mission is to help people find and share books they love. Goodreads launched in January 2007.1

Goals

This project’s goals is to acquire data from Goodreads.com using BeautifulSoup on Python. The data acquired will be including but not limited to book details, user score, and book in the lists.

Link

Visit here to view the code.
entry.summary: Background Goodreads is the world’s largest site for readers and book recommendations. Their mission is to help people find and share books they love. Goodreads launched in January 2007.1

entry.title: Goodreads Content Based Recommendation System
entry.content:
Goals

To create a content based recommendation system for book on Goodreads using Kaggle’s Goodreads’ Best Book ever.

Results

The results could be viewed in my github account .

entry.title: Optimization of Scheduling Strategies for Dynamic Stacking Problem in Uncertain Environment

link.title: Optimization of Scheduling Strategies for Dynamic Stacking Problem in Uncertain Environment

entry.content:
Goals

Creating a stacking algorithm for container industry so it could provide the most optimum stack with the smallest number of movement possible while minimize the waiting time of the external transportation.

Results

Here you can read the summary of this work, which involves optimization strategy using genetic algorithm for crane stacking situation.
entry.summary: Goals Creating a stacking algorithm for container industry so it could provide the most optimum stack with the smallest number of movement possible while minimize the waiting time of the external transportation.
